definition: any of various hard colored rocks (especially rocks consisting of chert or basalt)
details:
noun
- any of various hard colored rocks (especially rocks consisting of chert or basalt)
= synonyms: whinstone
- small Eurasian shrub having clusters of yellow flowers that yield a dye
= synonyms: woodwaxen, dyer's greenweed, dyer's-broom, dyeweed, greenweed, woadwaxen
- very spiny and dense evergreen shrub with fragrant golden-yellow flowers
= synonyms: gorse, furze
